Judul: STUDY OF ASSET MAINTENANCE MANAGEMENT IN PT TELEKOMUNIKASI INDONESIA, TBK
Abstrak:
Abstract:  
 
 

The fast growing of business telecommunication of PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia has consequence in increasing fixed asset that need to be managed and monitored accurately to improve company competitiveness. Currently, asset management at PT. Telekom is still in the early stage in which the processes are mainly focus on mapping asset and location, composing data base of fixed asset, and labeling hardware
Kata Kunci: Asset management, telecom, recording process, fishbone diagram
